short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display images from webpages on Izi Display.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Izi Display is a specialized Chrome extension that enables users to instantly project images from any website onto their smart TV. Designed for simplicity and ease of use, this extension is the perfect tool for users who want to enjoy a larger viewing experience of web images, share visual content in a group setting, or enrich their home entertainment.

Here’s how Izi Display enhances your browsing experience:

One-Click Projection: Effortlessly send images from your current web page directly to your smart TV with just a single click on the Izi Display icon.
Customizable Viewing Time: Tailor the duration each image is displayed on your smart TV right from the extension’s settings, giving you control over your viewing experience.
Broad Website Compatibility: Whether you’re on a photo-sharing platform, online retail sites, or any image-rich website, Izi Display works universally, ensuring your images scale beautifully on the big screen.
To use Izi Display, simply install the extension on your Chrome browser and ensure the Izi Display app is installed and running on your smart TV. The extension will detect your TV's Izi Display app, creating a seamless connection for image sharing.

Izi Display is perfect for professionals presenting visuals in a corporate environment, educators sharing educational content, or individuals who want to view their favorite web images on a larger canvas. It’s an ideal solution for enhancing presentations, galleries, and more with the power and clarity of your smart TV's display.
